Room.Name: Paladin Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: Congratulations, you have successfully defeated the Red Knight!
Room.LongDescription: And now, if you are spiritually ready to accept the added duties of an advanced paladin, kneel and receive your transformation. An intense, white light shines down on you, as you are now one of the chosen. From this day forward, you will know peace and serenity, so long as you fight against evil.
